General.Name: GNCO Co. Ltd
General.Description: GNCO Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells apparel for men and women in South Korea and internationally. It offers its apparel through Thursday Island, T.I FOR MEN, ELOQ, LOUDMUT, PHENOM, and COVETBLAN brands. The company sells its products through its brand stores, as well as online. GNCO Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
